title: On Link Prediction in Knowledge Bases: Max-K Criterion and Prediction Protocols
venue: Palace Garden Hotel and Resorts (朗丽兹西山花园酒店)
description: This talk was part of the meeting (AIS2018) held by Chinese Information Processing Society of China, Youth Working Committee and Baidu. Some authors who published papers on ACL2018, IJCAI2018 or SIGIR2018 shared their work in this meeting. I was there to present our SIGIR2018 paper.
